description._content: Bain News Service,, publisher. J.D. Botkin 1913 Dec. 22 (date created or published later by Bain) 1 negative : glass ; 5 x 7 in. or smaller. Notes: Title and date from data provided by the Bain News Service on the negative. Photo shows Jeremiah Dunham Botkin (1849-1921), a U.S. Representative from Kansas and warden of the Kansas State penitentiary (1913-1915). (Source: Flickr Commons project, 2010) Forms part of: George Grantham Bain Collection (Library of Congress). Format: Glass negatives. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print General information about the Bain Collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.ggbain Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ggbain.15088 Call Number: LC-B2- 2944-12
